alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Chinati Mountains; Chisos Basin; Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Marfa Plateau; Pecos (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 2:43AM CDT until March 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING TO 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with locally higher amounts possible in the highest elevations. * WHERE...Davis Mountains, Davis Mountains foothills, Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, Chinati Mountains, Chisos Basin, Pecos County, Marfa Plateau, and Central Brewster County. * WHEN...From 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ Friday to 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Difficult travel conditions are possible, especially in the highest terrain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452-9292.

area.areaDesc: Central Brewster County; Chinati Mountains; Chisos Basin; Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Marfa Plateau; Pecos
